metadata.name: Ava's Aurora
metadata.description:
Name: 'Ava's Aurora'

Artist: CryptoCrawlerz

Mint Date: March 20, 2022

Description: Ava, the dragonfly enjoys the crisp midnight air with her companion - traveling through the forests and fields, exploring the beauty of nature together. Their luminescent bodies emit beautiful glowing lights and guide their way through the night.

What is CryptoCrawlerz?

CryptoCrawlerz is a collectible series of virtual creatures, bugs, insects, and more!

These creepy creatures crawl, slither, and sneak their way around the blockchain.

CryptoCrawlerz: Foundation Series will consist of unique 1/1 artwork inspired by the main genesis series. Each 1/1 will be auctioned off, and the holder will be eligible for the same rewards that a gensis series holder has.

For any questions or to stay up to date with the latest drops, follow our social media below.

twitter.com/cryptocrawlerz
instagram.com/cryptocrawlerz
